Translations.Text: Do Midyan my sent ich brat Shu aib. He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. Nie cheat when ona measure weigh! Ja see ona bol prosperous ja fear ona retribution overwhelming dni
O moj zaludnit ona dat full measure full weight equitably! Nie cheat ludia ich na pravo nie roam zem corruptingly
Whatever GOD zadovazit for ona ziaden zalezitost ako male je daleko lepsie ona if ona bol skutocne believers. Ja nie bol guardian over ona
They said O Shu aib tvoj nabozenstvo dictate ona ze my zhyraly our rodicia nabozenstvo musiet running our zalezitost any chovanie my zvolit si? Iste ona zauzlit for bol clement wise

He said O moj ludia co ja have solid proof z moj Lord co He zadovazit mna velky zehnat Nie bol moj zelat commit co ja enjoin ona z. Ja len zelat toje spravne vela chybny mat rad ja viem. Moj guidance zavisiet totally GOD ja put moj trust Him. Do Him ja totally submitted
A O moj ludia nie provoked tvoj opposition mna into incurring same disasters ludia Noah ludia z Hood ludia z Saaleh; ludia Lot nie bol i daleko z ona
Ona implore tvoj Lord forgiveness potom repent Him. Moj Lord bol Merciful Laskavy
They said O Shu aib my nie comprehend vela z things ona telling us my see ona bol powerless among us. If nie bol tvoj tribe my stoned ona. Ona have value us
He said O moj ludia moj tribe command velka zretel than GOD this why ona je bol heedless z Him? Moj Lord je fully aware z everything ona robit

O moj ludia ist on robit co ona zelat a so will ja! Ona robit istota zalozit out kto z us incur shameful retribution; ona robit zalozit out kto liar bol Iba cakat anticipation ja cakat anticipation ona
When our judgment pojdem my saved Shu aib those verit him zlutovanie us. Mat rad for zlo jeden they struck disaster ze vlavo them dead do ich domov
Je mat rad though they never existed Thus Midyan zdochnut iba mat rad Thamoud zdochnut before ze
My sent Moses our znamenie profound authority
Do Pharaoh jeho elders they nasledovat command Pharaoh Pharaoh's command nie bol wise
He lead jeho ludia Dni Vzkriesenie all the way do Hell; co chudobny abode do zit v
They incurred condemnation v this zivot i mat rad on Dni Vzkriesenie; co chudobny chodnicek nasledovat
This bol zvest minuly obec my narrate ona. Some som still standing some zmiznut
My never zlo them; they zlo ich own souls. Ich gods they vzyvat GOD nie pomoc them v the maly when judgment tvoj Lord pojdem. Skutocne they len ensured ich doom
Such retribution enforced tvoj Lord when obec transgressed Indeed Jeho retribution bol painful devastating
This bol lekcia those fear retribution Hereafter Ze je dni when all ludia zvolat -Dni svedok
My appointed specific cas it berie miesto
Dni it pojdem nie ist okolo soul utter single word v accordance s Jeho will Some bol chudobny some bol happy
Mat rad for chudobny jeden they bol Hell wherein they sigh kvilit
Eternally they abide therein mat rad long mat rad heavens zem endure v accordance s will tvoj Lord Tvoj Lord bol doer z whatever He wills
